mapper.insert: insert into TimeClock(id, clockDate, timeIn, status) values (#{id}, #{clockDate}, #{timeIn}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from timeClock where id = #{id} and clockDate = #{date}
mapper.update: update Employee set availablePTO = availablePTO - #{PTO}, usedPTO = usedPTO + #{PTO}, availableSick = availableSick - #{sick}, usedSick = usedSick + #{sick}, usedUnpaid = usedUnpaid + #{unpaid} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into TimeOff(id, startDate, endDate, ptoRequested, sickRequested, unpaidRequested, Status) values (#{id}, #{startDate), #{endDate), #{ptoRequested}, #{sickRequested}, #{unpaidRequested}, #{status})
